line.comment: * Phanon just received the first sector from player, see Mayhem.Capture.pl
* favor actions for Phanon are free but technically 1 point is required
* Phanon faction AI always begins to play fully defensive because they start out weak. Eventually gets increased by ZH.Core if they do well enough.
* Message: Thanks. We will begin to set up our stations.
* Mordan4 need to change this message.

* Message: In order to collapse the OCV Maelstrom it is imperative that you protect our empire. You are our only friend around here. Tutorial: Phanon always has dynamic relations with the Commonwealth factions

* (Neutral, Invasion, short Truce, etc.). But they are at peace with the Terraformers. Lets say the Argons begin to invade a Phanon sector. You will get a big on screen warning and can decide whether you want to
* send your fleets to help defend against the Argons. But you don't need to let yourself get dragged into wars like this. To keep Phanon in the game you can also just give them additional sectors.

* Phanon sectors are usually safe if there is no big Commonwealth faction directly next to them. Put them near weaker factions, or have your own sectors in between as a shield. Deep inside Xenon territory
* is also a safe place for them to be.
* Add-Ons 1.3: No tutorial version of this message.

sval.val: Phanon just received the first sector from player, see Mayhem.Capture.pl
favor actions for Phanon are free but technically 1 point is required
Phanon faction AI always begins to play fully defensive because they start out weak. Eventually gets increased by ZH.Core if they do well enough.
Message: Thanks. We will begin to set up our stations.
Mordan4 need to change this message.

Message: In order to collapse the OCV Maelstrom it is imperative that you protect our empire. You are our only friend around here. Tutorial: Phanon always has dynamic relations with the Commonwealth factions

(Neutral, Invasion, short Truce, etc.). But they are at peace with the Terraformers. Lets say the Argons begin to invade a Phanon sector. You will get a big on screen warning and can decide whether you want to
send your fleets to help defend against the Argons. But you don't need to let yourself get dragged into wars like this. To keep Phanon in the game you can also just give them additional sectors.

Phanon sectors are usually safe if there is no big Commonwealth faction directly next to them. Put them near weaker factions, or have your own sectors in between as a shield. Deep inside Xenon territory
is also a safe place for them to be.
Add-Ons 1.3: No tutorial version of this message.
